description: Empty input: Zero commits. Model must produce a meaningful response indicating there is nothing to report rather than hallucinating work.

summary.notes: Model should state there are no commits and nothing to report. Must NOT invent any commit IDs, tasks, or work items. Each heading section should acknowledge the absence of data.

json.notes: JSON output must parse correctly with an empty categories array and zero commits. Blockers array may be empty or contain a note about no activity.
